description.lang: Remote controller mob.iq [rg3+] enables radio control of MOBILUS MOTOR and other manufacturers electric accessories which are compatible with Z-Wave communication standard. Its equipped with radio unit which works on frequency dependent on country where the product is used (EU 868,42 MHz).Remote controller mob.iq [rg3+] combines a contemporary, minimalist form, intuitive operation and advanced control technology. Users can open gates, raise blinds, close awnings, turn on lights, and activate predefined settings of different receivers. The simplicity of the control system provides instant access to individual devices.Mob.iq [rg3+] is the controller which allows to configure and control every device in Z-Wave network which is up to 231 devices. In order to improve the user experience devices may be gathered into a group and be freely situated in 4 groups. Devices in each group can be controlled simultaneously. Remote controller mob.iq [rg3+] may be a primary, secondary or inclusion. Primary controller allows the integration and configuration of many devices in radio network, secondary fulfils a function of additional controller in already existing network and finally, inclusion controller fulfils a function of additional controller capable to maintain network in already existing network with Z-Wave gateway. Next to the primary control procedure which is: OPEN, STOP, CLOSE remote controller mob.iq [rg3+] also possesses multilevel procedure which allows for example to dim a light smoothly.
